Detailed Description

template<class FMPartCore, class GainTmpl>
class FMPartTmpl4< FMPartCore, GainTmpl >

Iterative Refinement Partitioning Template Class. This version uses early stop policy. In the refinement phase of multi-level partitioning framework, it is unlikely that there are many moves in a single FM pass. By the experiments of benchmark testcases, 2x speed up are found than the traditional method.

See also:
FMPartTmpl
